properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 14 at 10:01PM CST until February 19 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Kentucky...

Green River at Paradise
Green River at Calhoun

.Runoff from recent heavy rainfall has resulted in river levels rising along
the Green River. Moderate flooding is occurring at Paradise and is forecast to
develop at Calhoun by tonight. At Calhoun, a crest is expected to occur this
weekend.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Green River at Paradise
* until Wednesday morning.
* At  9:15 PM Friday the stage was 388.4 feet.
* Flood Stage is 380.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river has crested and will continue to fall to below
flood stage by Wednesday morning.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
